intro.line1: <bold>Hi there! My name is Vadim Kim.</bold> I'm a <bold>frontend developer</bold> backed by a strong foundation in <bold>retail and B2B service</bold>.
intro.line2: I'm skilled in <italic>understanding user needs, solving problems, and delivering practical solutions</italic>.
intro.line3: I mostly use <underline>TypeScript, NextJS</underline> and Tailwind CSS.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: After graduating with a degree in <degree>Political science</degree>, I spent 7 years at Uniqlo, working my way up to <position>store manager</position>. Later, I moved into the <industry>Korean skincare industry as a sales manager</industry>, where I discovered an interest in web development. I <learning>started learning to code</learning> and completed multiple free courses and bootcamps. <favorite>My favorite part of programming</favorite> is the problem-solving aspect. I <love>love</love> the feeling of finally figuring out a solution to a problem. My core stack includes <stack>TypeScript, TailwindCSS and Docker</stack>. I am also familiar with NextJS and Supabase, and I am always looking to learn new technologies. <seeking>I am currently seeking a full-time position as a frontend developer</seeking> to continue building my skills and experience.
about.paragraph2: <notCoding>When I'm not coding</notCoding>, I love listening to music üéº, traveling the world üåé, and exploring new culinary concepts üç£. I also enjoy <learning>learning new things</learning> and am currently diving into <studying>fashion and design</studying>.
